data.title: Man arrested from Alwar for allegedly spying for Pakistan
data.text:
Synopsis

A man from Rajasthan's Alwar district, Mangat Singh, has been arrested for allegedly spying for Pakistan's ISI. He reportedly shared sensitive Indian military information, including troop movements, with a Pakistani handler via social media and received over Rs 10,000 in return. Singh, known locally as a 'Siddh Purush', allegedly used religious gatherings to build trust with defence personnel.
data.summary:
